translated: In one's heart, in the center of a moon disc, one should meditate on the seed syllable vaṃ, from which arises the Blessed Lady Vasudharā, who is golden in color,

original: rgyan mtha' dag dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rgyan mtha' dag dang ldan pa /
translated: adorned with all the ornaments,

original: lo brgyad pa gnyis kyi tshad du gyur pa /

translated: and with her left hand holding the top of a rice ear,

translated: To the right is Vasuprabhā.

original: rgyab na ni nor dpal gyi zhal lo //

translated: Behind is the face of Vasudhara.

original: g-yon na ni nor dpal gyi blo gros ma'o //
analyzed: g-yon na ni nor dpal gyi blo gros ma'o //
translated: To the left is Vasudhara's intellect.

analyzed: de dag kyang sa bon rang gi dang po'i yi ge las gtso mo dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs su bsam par bya ba'o //

original: de ltar rnam par bsgoms la /

translated: Having thus visualized them,

original: sngags legs par bgrang bar bya ste /
analyzed: sngags legs par bgrang bar bya ste /

original: aom shr'i ba su mu khi sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i ba su mu khi sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī vasumukhi svāhā.

original: aom ba su ma ti shri ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ba su ma ti shri ye sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vasumatīśriyai svāhā.

analyzed: nyi ma re re bzhin du ba lang gi lci ba khru gnyis tsam gyi tshad kyi mandala grva bzhi pa byas la /
translated: Every day, one should make a four-cornered maṇḍala of cow dung two cubits in size,

original: me tog dri zhim bos thun tshod gsum du legs par mchod de /
analyzed: me tog dri zhim bos thun tshod gsum du legs par mchod de /
translated: and make offerings with fragrant flowers three times a day.

original: 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas pa byas la /
analyzed: 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas pa byas la /
translated: Having recited [the mantra] four hundred thousand times,

original: me tog dri zhim @9b pos thun tshod gsum du legs par mchod de /
analyzed: me tog dri zhim @9b pos thun tshod gsum du legs par mchod de /
translated: one should make offerings with fragrant flowers three times a day.

original: 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas pa byas pas zla ba drug na yid la re ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas pa byas pas zla ba drug na yid la re ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites it 400,000 times, within six months all one's wishes will be fulfilled.

original: ji ltar rnyed par gyur pa'i me tog rnams kyis 'bum phrag bzhi'i sbyin sreg bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rnyed par gyur pa'i me tog rnams kyis 'bum phrag bzhi'i sbyin sreg bya ba'o //

original: sbyin sreg byas bas ni dpal shin tu chen bo dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyin sreg byas bas ni dpal shin tu chen bo dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: By performing the homa, one will obtain great glory.

original: nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
translated: The sadhana of Vasudhara is complete.
